mapper.sql: a.id, a.orderdetail_id as orderdetailId, a.mode, a.express_type as expressType, a.express_company_code as expressCompanyCode, a.express_company_name as expressCompanyName, a.express_no as expressNo, a.express_fee as expressFee, a.from_city_code as fromCityCode, a.from_city_name as fromCityName, a.to_city_code as toCityCode, a.to_city_name as toCityName
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_orderdetail_express(orderdetail_id, mode, express_type, express_company_code, express_company_name, express_no, express_fee, from_city_code, from_city_name, to_city_code, to_city_name) VALUES (#{orderdetailId}, #{mode}, #{expressType}, #{expressCompanyCode}, #{expressCompanyName}, #{expressNo}, #{expressFee}, #{fromCityCode}, #{fromCityName}, #{toCityCode}, #{toCityName})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_orderdetail_express SET id= #{id} ,mode = #{mode} ,express_type = #{expressType} ,express_company_code = #{expressCompanyCode} ,express_company_name = #{expressCompanyName} ,express_no = #{expressNo} ,express_fee = #{expressFee} ,from_city_code = #{fromCityCode} ,from_city_name = #{fromCityName} ,to_city_code = #{toCityCode} ,to_city_name = #{toCityName} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM t_orderdetail_express a WHERE a.id = #{id}
SELECT FROM t_orderdetail_express a WHERE 1 = 1 order by id limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT FROM t_orderdetail_express a WHERE 1 = 1 and orderdetail_id = #{orderdetailId} and mode = #{mode} order by id
SELECT FROM t_orderdetail_express a WHERE a.id = #{id}
select count(1) from t_orderdetail_express t where 1 = 1
